translations.en:
: ** :bust_in_silhouette: During your journey you arrive in a seaside town. There you meet a man, who says that his name is Price and that he is a mercenary.

:person_walking: Pay him to accompany you to your next destination
:meat_on_bone: Get to know each other over a good meal
:money_mouth: Try to steal money from him

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
